description:
She and her son move in as new neighbours to Ichimaru and Asami. Being on the lookout for a husband, and father to Sasuke, her eyes immediately turn to Ichimaru.
She is well aware of her sexy body and uses it to work as a hostess at a local club.
After she learns of the marriage between Ichimaru and Asami, both she and her son promise to keep it a secret from Asami`s school and everybody else too. Not always an easy task.
name: Mizunosaki Sakura
